DellMemory.description: An instance of DellMemory will have Memory Device specific data.
DellMemory.longDescription: An instance of DellMemory will have Memory Device specific data.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BankLabel.description: The property shall represent a string identifying the physically labeled bank where the memory is located.
BankLabel.longDescription: The property shall represent a string identifying the physically labeled bank where the memory is located.

LastSystemInventoryTime.description: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastSystemInventoryTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time System Inventory Collection On Reboot (CSIOR) was performed or the object was last updated on iDRAC. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

LastUpdateTime.description: This property provides the last time the data was updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.
LastUpdateTime.longDescription: This property provides the last time the data was updated. The value is represented as yyyymmddHHMMSS.

ManufactureDate.description: The property shall represent manufacture date of the product.
ManufactureDate.longDescription: The property shall represent manufacture date of the product.

MemoryTechnology.description: This property indicates the type of memory technology that the memory device uses.
MemoryTechnology.longDescription: This property indicates the type of memory technology that the memory device uses.

Model.description: The name by which the PhysicalElement is generally known.
Model.longDescription: The name by which the PhysicalElement is generally known.

RemainingRatedWriteEndurancePercent.description: Displays the wear-out percentage of the NVDIMMs. Possible values are between 100% and 0%. The value of 255 indicates that the wear out percentage is Not Applicable.
RemainingRatedWriteEndurancePercent.longDescription: Displays the wear-out percentage of the NVDIMMs. Possible values are between 100% and 0%. The value of 255 indicates that the wear out percentage is Not Applicable.

SystemEraseCapability.description: The property indicates whether or not the device has the capability of being erased through SystemErase() API.
SystemEraseCapability.longDescription: The property indicates whether or not the device has the capability of being erased through SystemErase() API.

title: #DellMemory.v1_1_0.DellMemory
